v0.1.0.description:
The initial release of our Outward Archipelago mod!

## What's Changed
* bugfix 3 - APWorld now generates the correct number of filler items by @Daemonarian in https://github.com/Daemonarian/AP_Outward/pull/10
* bugfix 1 - fixed issue where unique items in the player's backpack or… by @Daemonarian in https://github.com/Daemonarian/AP_Outward/pull/11
* bugfix 5 - changed the AP item to have most of the properties of hack… by @Daemonarian in https://github.com/Daemonarian/AP_Outward/pull/12
* bugfix 4 - moved the AP connection status icon to the right of the ma… by @Daemonarian in https://github.com/Daemonarian/AP_Outward/pull/13
* bugfix 2 - changed RGB shader effect to look for a *mesh* renderer by @Daemonarian in https://github.com/Daemonarian/AP_Outward/pull/14
* added death-link support by @Daemonarian in https://github.com/Daemonarian/AP_Outward/pull/15

## New Contributors
* @Daemonarian made their first contribution in https://github.com/Daemonarian/AP_Outward/pull/10

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Daemonarian/AP_Outward/commits/v0.1.0
v0.1.0.title: v0.1.0

v0.2.0.description:
Features:
- all vanilla items/skills added as AP items
- Skillsanity
- Breakthough points as AP item and skill trainers as location checks
- Cabal of Wind altars location/items
- modified skill trainers during Peacemaker quest to continue giving location checks
- added warning to main menu when entering game while disconnected

Bugfixes:
- all completed locations are sent to the server when upon reconnect
- progression items no longer appear in locations that can be missed
v0.2.0.title: v0.2.0
